name: Steel Souls
description:
A demo of a small adventure game made over a summer.

If this game is too difficult, toggle easy mode by pressing 'E' and 'Z' at the same time, which increases your HP (strongly discouraged however).

People and resources used:

1x programmer (me)

3x artists (Jason Lin, Insoo Yoon, Cristopher Navarro)

3x unity editors

1x github repo

3x photoshops & photopea

1x all-nighter

Very Special Thanks to:

Aaron Kwan (surprise surprise)

Ketan Yadav

Cindy Wang

As always, thanks for playing  :)
